import React from "react" import { Input, CreateField, TextAreaAboutMe, ContactFormInput } from "../../assetss/common/ValidatorsComponents/ElementsValidators"; import pc from './UserInfo.module.css' import {MaxLengthCreator, required} from "../../utils/validators"; const ProfileDataEditorForm = (props) => { debugger return
My name is : {CreateField("Enter your full name", "fullName", [required], Input)}
are u looking for a job? : {CreateField("", "lookingForAJob", [], Input, {type: "checkbox"})}
My professional skills: {CreateField("Enter description", "lookingForAJobDescription", [], TextAreaAboutMe)}
about me: {CreateField("print something about you", "aboutMe", [], TextAreaAboutMe)}
My contacts :
{Object.keys(props.contacts).map(key => { return
{key} : {CreateField(key, "contacts." + key, [], ContactFormInput)}
})}
{props.error ?
{props.error}
: null}
} export default ProfileDataEditorForm
